## IIndividualVersionJson interface

This interface represents the raw individual version policy JSON object which extends the base version policy with additional fields specific to individual versioning.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IIndividualVersionJson extends IVersionPolicyJson 
```
**Extends:** [IVersionPolicyJson](./rush-lib.iversionpolicyjson.md)
